attributes.action: Ban the proposed march through Wootton Bassett by ISLAM4UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed march by Islam 4 UK through Wootton Basset is insulting to the vast majority of the UK population, and will incite racial hatred and is disrespectful to the memory of our troops killed in action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
